column5: It's finally here!!!!  Mercman sent me a package back in december via purolator, and it just arrived. and to my surprise there was more in the box then he told me. along with it, is a baseball cap and a screw driver/ tire valve tool. Thank you Mercman!! merci beaucoup  gotta love the members on this board
My pleasure Skeets !!! Of course ya know, that BBQ sauce is addictive I put it on everything
I want a package me me me! PRetty please!
Merc.....I see you're busy buying friends again....LOL  Bob
well............you know how it is bob.no tax either
NO TAX....then go for it...  You must of found a loop hole...
ah yes...the BB seal of approval.ya see  i listen good eh!!!
